translation.en: [narrator] Meet Terry Seattle, Homicide Division.
translation.zh: 来见见凶杀案组的泰瑞西雅图

translation.en: For Terry, every day, means a new murder case,
translation.zh: 对泰瑞而言 每一天都意味着一起新的谋杀案

translation.en: and a new celebrity guest star as his partner.
translation.zh: 和一位新的明星来客串他的搭档

translation.en: Today's guest: comedy legend Conan O'Brien.
translation.zh: 今天的客串明星是 传奇喜剧演员柯南奥布莱恩

translation.en: But here's the catch.
translation.zh: 但有个问题

translation.en: Conan isn't being given a script.
translation.zh: 他还没有拿到剧本

translation.en: He has no idea what's about to happen.
translation.zh: 他完全不知道将会发生什么

translation.en: Together, he and Terry will have to improvise their way through the case.
translation.zh: 他和泰瑞不得不 一起临时想出破案的办法

translation.en: But it'll be up to Conan alone to name the killer.
translation.zh: 但柯南只能独自一人说出凶手的名字

translation.en: So join them as they punch a one-way ticket
translation.zh: 加入他们吧 他们的单程票目的地就是

translation.en: to Murderville.
translation.zh: Murderville

translation.en: [male deep voice] The big city.
translation.zh: 一座大城市

translation.en: Where only the strong survive…
translation.zh: 强者才能生存

translation.en: And the ruthless… thrive.
translation.zh: 无情才不沉沦

translation.en: I just made that rhyme up.
translation.zh: 这是我刚编出来的押韵

translation.en: No big deal. I can do all sorts of cool stuff.
translation.zh: 没什么大不了的 我可以做各种酷事

translation.en: My name is Terry Seattle.
translation.zh: 我叫泰瑞西雅图

translation.en: I'm a senior homicide detective. And I am killing it.
translation.zh: 我是高级凶杀案警探 我对我的工作非常在行

translation.en: Detective.
translation.zh: 警探

translation.en: Morning, Chief.
translation.zh: 早上好 长官

translation.en: Pleasure to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Pleasure to see you. I hope you're doing very well.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 希望你一切都好

translation.en: I am doing very well. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我非常好 谢谢

translation.en: You need to come past the house and pick up the rest of your crap.
translation.zh: 你需要来家里一趟 把你的破烂都拿走

translation.en: That is not crap, Rhonda, that's 17 years of marriage.
translation.zh: 那不是破烂 荣达 那是17年的婚姻

translation.en: It's a broken PlayStation 2, some old Maxim magazines,
translation.zh: 那是一台坏掉的二代索尼游戏机 一些旧《马克西姆》杂志

translation.en: a car wash receipt signed by Axl Rose
translation.zh: 一张艾克索罗斯签过名的洗车小票

translation.en: and a "Take me drunk I'm home" t-shirt.
translation.zh: 一件印着 “我喝家了 带我回醉”的短袖

translation.en: If you had read just one of those Maxim articles,
translation.zh: 如果你哪怕只看过一本 那些《马克西姆》杂志的话

translation.en: you would know that as a modern male--
translation.zh: 你就会知道作为一个现代男人…

translation.en: Terry, come get your shit or I'm throwing it out.
translation.zh: 泰瑞 过来把你的破烂拿走 要不我就都扔了

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Don't pout, Detective. I've got a present for you.
translation.zh: 别闷闷不乐的 警探 我有一件礼物送给你

translation.en: A new partner.
translation.zh: 一个新的搭档

translation.en: No, you can't be serious. Come on, my life's not going wrong enough as it is
translation.zh: 不 你不会是认真的吧 别闹 就好像我现在的生活还不够糟似的

translation.en: that I gotta babysit some homicide trainee?
translation.zh: 现在我还得照顾凶案组的实习生？

translation.en: Do you not remember what happened when I babysat your nephew?
translation.zh: 你不记得 我照顾你侄子时发生了什么吗？

translation.en: Come on out, Conan.
translation.zh: 出来吧 柯南

translation.en: [Rhonda] Come a little closer.
translation.zh: 走近点

translation.en: I never liked to presume how close I can get.
translation.zh: 我从来都不喜欢擅自决定我能靠多近

translation.en: [Rhonda] That's just fine.
translation.zh: 这样就挺好

translation.en: Terry, meet your new partner, Conan O'Brien.
translation.zh: 泰瑞 见见你的新搭档 柯南奥布莱恩

translation.en: Conan, this is senior detective, Terry Seattle.
translation.zh: 柯南 这是高级警探泰瑞西雅图

translation.en: Good to see you, sir. How are you?
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 警官 你好吗？

translation.en: Got quite a grip on you, huh?
translation.zh: 你手劲挺大啊

translation.en: -[Conan] Yeah. -Good Lord.
translation.zh: -是吧 -我的天

translation.en: -[Terry] Yes. [chuckles] -[Conan] Yeah, okay. Yeah.
translation.zh: -是的 -是的 好吧 是的

translation.en: Put your fingers in your ears.
translation.zh: 用手指把耳朵堵住

translation.en: Are you joking?
translation.zh: 你是在跟我开玩笑吗？

translation.en: I mean, did I just turn seven years old? Because you hired a goddamn clown!
translation.zh: 我是说 我看起来像是刚满七岁吗？ 因为你雇了个该死的小丑！

translation.en: You're the only detective who can't keep a partner.
translation.zh: 你是唯一一个 不能维系搭档关系的警探

translation.en: Yeah, because they're all idiots!
translation.zh: 是啊 因为他们都是白痴！

translation.en: I mean, look at this guy with his fingers in his ears. I mean, God!
translation.zh: 我说 看看这个用手指 堵住耳朵的家伙 我的妈啊！

translation.en: I can actually, the fingers don't actually block out the sound that well,
translation.zh: 我其实可以… 手指并不能很好地隔绝声音

translation.en: so I heard clown, I heard idiot.
translation.zh: 所以我听到了你说小丑和白痴

translation.en: Terry, make it work.
translation.zh: 泰瑞 自己想办法跟他合作

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Let me tell you something.
translation.zh: 我跟你说

translation.en: This ginger monstrosity is the biggest mistake in the history of city homicide!
translation.zh: 这个长雀斑的红发怪物是 城市凶杀组史上最大的不幸！

translation.en: No offense. None taken.
translation.zh: -无意冒犯 -没关系

translation.en: You seem very nervous.
translation.zh: 你看起来很紧张

translation.en: It's my first day on the job and you're a bit of a legend, so.
translation.zh: 今天是我第一天上班 你又算是个传奇人物 所以…

translation.en: It's Terry Seattle. Is that it?
translation.zh: 你是泰瑞西雅图 对吧？

translation.en: You do more bowing than a goddamn Tommy Tune.
translation.zh: 你比汤米托恩鞠的躬还要多

translation.en: Okay, bit of an outdated reference if you ask me, but--
translation.zh: 好吧 我觉得你举的这个 例子有点过时了 但是…

translation.en: Follow me.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: -It's a great office you have here. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你这办公室可真不错

translation.en: Talker.
translation.zh: 话真多

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh: 是的 好吧

translation.en: Senior detective, Terry Seattle. And no, I've never been.
translation.zh: 我是高级警探泰瑞西雅图 然后我从没去过西雅图

translation.en: That was gonna be my first question.
translation.zh: 这原本是我想问的第一个问题

translation.en: -Of course it was. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -当然了 -是的

translation.en: I got married in Seattle.
translation.zh: 我在西雅图结的婚

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I got married in Seattle.
translation.zh: 我在西雅图结的婚

translation.en: No, I mean, you got married?
translation.zh: 不 我是问你结婚了？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: To what?
translation.zh: 跟谁？

translation.en: To a wonderful woman.
translation.zh: 跟一个极好的女人

translation.en: Does she know?
translation.zh: 她知道吗？

translation.en: She has an idea. Let's just put it that way.
translation.zh: 这么说吧 她对这件事还是略知一二的

translation.en: Listen, I hope you don't take this personal,
translation.zh: 听着 我希望你别觉得这是在针对你

translation.en: but I'm not really looking for a new partner. I already had the best.
translation.zh: 但我没有在找新搭档 我已经有过最好的了

translation.en: Her name was Lori Griffin. And she was murdered 15 years ago.
translation.zh: 她的名字叫劳瑞格里芬 15年前她被谋杀了

translation.en: And out of respect for Lori Griffin,
translation.zh: 出于对她的尊重

translation.en: her desk has remained completely untouched.
translation.zh: 从她死的那晚到现在

translation.en: Since that night.
translation.zh: 她的桌子完全没有动过

translation.en: Everything is the same, just the way she left it. Her case notes,
translation.zh: 一切都和她离开时一样 她的案件笔记本

translation.en: her uneaten breakfast burrito,
translation.zh: 她没吃的早餐卷饼

translation.en: her pet rabbit, Gulliver. God, I miss that little guy.
translation.zh: 她的宠物兔子格列佛 天啊 我好想念那个小家伙

translation.en: You know, you can feed those things even after the owner's gone.
translation.zh: 你知道 即使主人走了 你也可以喂养这些动物

translation.en: It would not be respectful to touch it.
translation.zh: 碰它就显得不够尊敬了

translation.en: Just feed and water them, a rabbit can live--
translation.zh: 只是给它喂水喂饭 兔子可以活个…

translation.en: Disrespectful.
translation.zh: 不够尊敬

translation.en: 40 years. Disrespectful.
translation.zh: -…40年 -不够尊敬

translation.en: What'd you do prior to this,
translation.zh: 你在这之前是干什么的？

translation.en: before you decided to become a homicide detective? What kind of work were you in?
translation.zh: 在你决定成为一名凶杀案警探之前 你做过什么工作？

translation.en: Been a lot of things. An entertainer for a while. I, uh--
translation.zh: 我从事过很多工作 当过艺人 我…

translation.en: Yeah. Well, listen, none of that matters now. Nobody cares.
translation.zh: 好吧 听着 现在这些都不重要了 没人在乎

translation.en: -Well, you just asked. -No, but none of it matters.
translation.zh: -好吧 可你刚问了 -不 那些都不重要

translation.en: City homicide isn't for precious little man-boys
translation.zh: 城市凶杀组不适合娇生惯养的少爷

translation.en: who are afraid to get their lips dirty and their pants wet. Okay?
translation.zh: 他们怕把嘴唇弄脏 裤子弄湿 好吧？

translation.en: No, I wouldn't think so.
translation.zh: 不 我觉得不会的

translation.en: 'Cause you don't know anything about getting your lips dirty, do you?
translation.zh: 因为你根本不知道 怎么弄脏你的嘴唇 对吧？

translation.en: You probably keep your lips real clean.
translation.zh: 你的嘴唇保养得老干净了

translation.en: I can get these lips as dirty as you want them to be.
translation.zh: 你要是想的话我能把嘴唇弄得老脏了

translation.en: Just covered in all kinds of stuff.
translation.zh: 糊上一顿乱七八糟的东西

translation.en: City homicide, we're bad dudes.
translation.zh: 城市凶杀组 我们可坏了

translation.en: I'm a bad dude. Are you a bad dude?
translation.zh: 我可坏了 你坏吗？

translation.en: Listen,
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: you are a bad mofo. Everyone knows it.
translation.zh: 你是个老坏王八蛋 大家都知道

translation.en: And I want to get in there. I want to get my hands dirty, my lips dirty.
translation.zh: 我想在这上班 我想弄脏我的手 弄脏我的嘴唇

translation.en: I want to solve whatever case comes our way.
translation.zh: 不论分配给我们什么案子 我都想把它解决了

translation.en: He's got the goods.
translation.zh: 他有点东西

translation.en: He's got what it takes to be a hard-ass, homicide detective trainee.
translation.zh: 他有成为凶杀组硬汉实习探员的潜质

translation.en: Well, that's good news. Because there's been a murder.
translation.zh: 嗯 这可是个好消息 因为发生了一起谋杀案

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: A magician performing at the grand opening of the city library
translation.zh: 一名魔术师在市图书馆的 盛大开幕式上表演

translation.en: sawed his assistant in half
translation.zh: 把他的助理锯成了两半

translation.en: but couldn't put her back together again.
translation.zh: 但是却拼不回去了

translation.en: [grunts] Classic Humpty Dumpty.
translation.zh: 一经损坏 无法复原

translation.en: I need you two down there on the double.
translation.zh: 我需要你们俩火速前往现场

translation.en: Goodbye, Chief.
translation.zh: 再见 长官

translation.en: You ready to go solve this murder?
translation.zh: 你准备好解决案子了吗？

translation.en: I am. I'm ready to go.
translation.zh: 是的 随时准备出发

translation.en: -Yeah, let's get going. -All right.
translation.zh: -好 我们走吧 -好的

translation.en: [Terry] We took my '82 Dodge Rampage
translation.zh: 我们开了我1982年 出产的道奇公羊

translation.en: over to the library to check out the crime scene.
translation.zh: 去图书馆查看犯罪现场

translation.en: It was time for Conan to take off his training diaper
translation.zh: 是时候让柯南脱掉训练才穿的尿布

translation.en: and start pooping his pants like a big boy.
translation.zh: 开始像个大人一样拉裤子了 （犯罪现场 城市公共图书馆）

translation.en: Terry Seattle, Senior Detec-- Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 泰瑞西雅图来了 无所谓

translation.en: You don't need to show-- we're in a crime scene, okay?
translation.zh: 你不需要展示… 我们在犯罪现场 好吗？

translation.en: I think we should find out what the hell went on here.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该 弄清楚这里到底发生了什么

translation.en: -Officers. -Officers.
translation.zh: -警官 -警官

translation.en: I already said officers.
translation.zh: 我已经说过警官了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Well, well, look at this guy.
translation.zh: 看看这家伙

translation.en: Hola, Seattle.
translation.zh: 你好 西雅图

translation.en: You must be Terry's new partner.
translation.zh: 你一定是泰瑞的新搭档

translation.en: Yes. I'm his new partner, Conan O'Brien. What's your name?
translation.zh: 是的 我是他的新搭档柯南奥布莱恩 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Detective Darren Phillips. Most people call me Daz.
translation.zh: 我是达伦菲利普斯警探 大多数人都叫我达崽

translation.en: Nobody call-- I don't call you Daz at all.
translation.zh: 没人叫… 我从来不叫你达崽

translation.en: [Daz] It's a pleasure.
translation.zh: -幸会 -我不知道

translation.en: Detective Phillips, honor to see you. What's going on?
translation.zh: 菲利普斯警探 很荣幸见到你 这里发生什么了？

translation.en: All right, stop schmoozing with this guy. What's wrong? You're just embarrassing.
translation.zh: 好了 别跟这家伙贫嘴了 你什么毛病？多尴尬啊

translation.en: Just tell him it's our crime scene and get the hell out of here.
translation.zh: 告诉他这是我们的犯罪现场 让他滚蛋

translation.en: Hey, this is our crime scene. We're taking lead on this one.
translation.zh: 嘿 这是我们的犯罪现场 这次由我们负责

translation.en: We understand there's been a homicide murder.
translation.zh: 我们知道这里发生了一起凶杀案

translation.en: Uh, victim sawed in half during some kind of magical performance, if you will.
translation.zh: 听说受害者在某种 魔术表演中被锯成两半

translation.en: Why are you telling him? He's an officer.
translation.zh: 你为什么告诉他？他是一个警官

translation.en: I'm reviewing the facts of what I've heard so far.
translation.zh: 我在回顾我目前所听到的事实

translation.en: Let's continue. Sir, please. How can we help?
translation.zh: 让我们继续 先生 请问我们能帮上什么忙？

translation.en: What do we got here?
translation.zh: 这里是什么情况？

translation.en: This gentleman is Captivating Keith.
translation.zh: 这位先生是万人迷基思

translation.en: It was his assistant who got sawed in half.
translation.zh: 被锯成两半的是他的助手

translation.en: I don't know what happened, man.
translation.zh: 我不知道发生了什么 天啊

translation.en: My assistant, Sarah and me, we just--
translation.zh: 我的助理莎拉和我只是…

translation.en: we did the same routine we've always done.
translation.zh: 我们做了和往常一样的流程

translation.en: Somebody must have gone in and they must have
translation.zh: 一定是什么人进去了 然后那人一定是

translation.en: replaced the trick saw with a real saw.
translation.zh: 把魔术锯换成了真锯

translation.en: The blood. There, there, blood. It's just everywhere! Blood!
translation.zh: 那些血 这也有 那也有 全是血 到处都是血！

translation.en: Did you think at any point when there was all that blood
translation.zh: 你看到有那么多血的时候 你在某个瞬间有没有想过

translation.en: that maybe you should stop sawing? Did that occur to you?
translation.zh: 也许你应该别锯了？你想到过吗？

translation.en: Maybe. Did you have a safe word that you normally employ?
translation.zh: -或许吧 -你们有常用的安全词吗？

translation.en: -Of course we had a safe word. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我们当然有安全词 -好吧

translation.en: If anything was to go wrong, my assistant was supposed to shout, "Stop!"
translation.zh: 如果出了什么差错 我的助手应该大喊“住手”

translation.en: But all I heard was, "Keith, you're sawing me in half."
translation.zh: 但我只听到 “基思 你要把我锯成两半了”

translation.en: -I guess it's not the safe word. -No, they're not the same.
translation.zh: -我猜那不是安全词 -对 不一样

translation.en: -Yeah, well… Really isn't. -There's rules.
translation.zh: -好吧 确实不一样 -这是规矩

translation.en: We're sorry for your loss.
translation.zh: 节哀顺变

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Terry] Amber.
translation.zh: 安珀

translation.en: This is Amber Kang. Forensics.
translation.zh: 这位是法医安珀康

translation.en: Nice to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Homicide detective, Kang Coroner… Uh…
translation.zh: 我是凶杀组警探 法医安康…

translation.en: -What…? -What? I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -什么？ -什么？抱歉

translation.en: What are you doing? You're embarrassing, you're so nerv--
translation.zh: 你在干嘛？你也太尴尬 太紧张了

translation.en: I got nervous.
translation.zh: 我有点紧张

translation.en: Amber, um…
translation.zh: 安珀

translation.en: we'd like to know what's happening here. State of the body… dead, I presume.
translation.zh: 我们想知道这里发生了什么 尸体的状态 我猜已经死了

translation.en: Very dead.
translation.zh: 死透了

translation.en: What've we got here, Amber?
translation.zh: 这里是什么情况 安珀？

translation.en: Let me take you over to the murder weapon.
translation.zh: 我带你去看凶器吧

translation.en: Now, here's something interesting. No fingerprints.
translation.zh: 这可有点意思 没有指纹

translation.en: But, you'll never guess what I did find on the handle.
translation.zh: 但你绝对猜不到 我在把手上找到了什么

translation.en: Traces of hot sauce.
translation.zh: 有辣酱的痕迹

translation.en: -Hot sauce on the handle. -Spicy.
translation.zh: -把手上有辣酱 -很辣哦

translation.en: [chuckles] The body is right there.
translation.zh: 尸体就在那里

translation.en: And you're being a total clown.
translation.zh: 你完全就像个小丑

translation.en: Now, just take it easy.
translation.zh: 现在你就放轻松点

translation.en: Uh… traces of hot sauce. Were you able to trace what kind of hot sauce?
translation.zh: 有辣酱的痕迹 你查到是哪种辣酱了吗？

translation.en: Not yet, but we also found trace amounts of pet hair.
translation.zh: 还没有 但我们也发现了少量的宠物毛发

translation.en: Most likely a small animal.
translation.zh: 大概率是小型动物

translation.en: Interesting.
translation.zh: -有意思 -小型动物？

translation.en: What are you thinking? Maybe a beagle out for revenge?
translation.zh: -有意思 -小型动物？ 你怎么看 心怀怨念的比格犬？

translation.en: Anything else, Amber?
translation.zh: 还有什么别的吗 安珀？

translation.en: Well, did you take a look at the suitcase?
translation.zh: 你检查过手提箱了吗？

translation.en: Says this is where Captivating Keith kept his trick saw.
translation.zh: 据说万人迷基思 就把他的电锯放在这里

translation.en: Now apparently, he was the only one with a key
translation.zh: 很明显 只有他有钥匙

translation.en: so someone must have picked the lock, switched the saws.
translation.zh: 所以肯定是有人撬开了锁 换了锯子

translation.en: [girl] Excuse me, Mr. Policeman.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 警察先生

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: When is the magician going to finish the trick?
translation.zh: 魔术师什么时候才能完成这个表演？

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna look at some evidence
translation.zh: 这个… 我要去看一些证据

translation.en: and this tall, young gentleman here
translation.zh: 这位高大年轻的先生

translation.en: will be happy to answer any of your questions.
translation.zh: 会很乐意回答你的任何问题

translation.en: [Terry] So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: Hello, what's your name?
translation.zh: 你好 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: When is the magician going to put the lady back together?
translation.zh: 魔术师什么时候 才能把这位女士拼回来？

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: the lady can't go back together
translation.zh: 那位女士拼不回去了

translation.en: because what happened,
translation.zh: 因为呢

translation.en: is the magician
translation.zh: 那个魔术师

translation.en: really sawed her in half,
translation.zh: 真的把她锯成两半了

translation.en: cut through skin,
translation.zh: 穿透皮肤

translation.en: ligament, muscle, bone.
translation.zh: 韧带、肌肉、骨头

translation.en: She had instantaneous, probably 90% blood loss
translation.zh: 她一瞬间就失去了大概90%的血

translation.en: and then she went into that black void
translation.zh: 然后她就进入了黑暗的虚无

translation.en: known as death.
translation.zh: 人称死亡

translation.en: Where there is no return.
translation.zh: 那里没有回头路

translation.en: She's gone. Gone forever.
translation.zh: 她离开了 永远的离开了

translation.en: What does that all even mean? I don't--
translation.zh: 这都是什么意思？我不…

translation.en: She's dead.
translation.zh: 她死了

translation.en: -I just don't understand-- -She's so dead.
translation.zh: -我不理解… -死得透透的

translation.en: I just don't understand. Is magic real or not?
translation.zh: 我还是不理解 这到底是不是魔术？

translation.en: It's a very simple question, sir. It's a yes or no!
translation.zh: 这是个很简单的问题 先生 是或不是！

translation.en: It's not magic.
translation.zh: 这不是魔术

translation.en: It is magic.
translation.zh: 这是魔术

translation.en: -God. -Look at the sign behind you.
translation.zh: -天啊 -看看你后面的标志

translation.en: Yeah, I know. That's what grown-ups call a lie.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道 这就是大人所说的谎言

translation.en: Is this what dying is?
translation.zh: 这就是死亡吗？

translation.en: That's what I told you. Yes, this is what dying is like.
translation.zh: 我刚就是这么告诉你的 是的 死亡就是这样

translation.en: She'll go to heaven, right?
translation.zh: 她会去天堂的 对吧？

translation.en: Oh, well, I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Will she still be in two pieces when she's in heaven?
translation.zh: 当她到了天堂还会是两截吗？

translation.en: Well, no, my guess is, before they put her in the ground--
translation.zh: 不 我的猜测是 他们把她下葬之前会把她缝…

translation.en: All right, trainee, let's go. We found some new evidence.
translation.zh: 好了 实习生 我们走 我们发现了一些新证据

translation.en: [grunts] Was on my knee for a long time.
translation.zh: 有点跪太久了

translation.en: [Terry] Our first suspect was Captivating Keith's former assistant, Deb.
translation.zh: 我们的第一个嫌疑人是 万人迷基思的前助理黛比

translation.en: She'd recently been fired and replaced
translation.zh: 她最近被解雇 然后替代她的是

translation.en: with the much younger and now much deader, Sarah.
translation.zh: 更年轻的莎拉 现在也更死翘翘

translation.en: Welcome to Quirky Jack's Homestyle Eatery.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到古怪杰克风味餐厅

translation.en: Where we serve heaping portions of whimsy and medium-sized portions of food.
translation.zh: 我们提供堆成山的美味 和中等份量的食物

translation.en: My name is Deb, I'll be your server.
translation.zh: 我叫黛比 是你们的服务员 （嫌疑犯一号 前助理黛比）

translation.en: Can I start you off with a bowl of our world-famous deep-fried chowder?
translation.zh: 先给您来一碗举世闻名的油炸杂烩？

translation.en: We're not really hungry for food, Deb.
translation.zh: 我们渴望的不是食物 黛比

translation.en: We are hungry for answers.
translation.zh: 我们渴望的是答案

translation.en: Is this about what happened to Sarah at Keith's magic show?
translation.zh: 是因为莎拉 在基思魔术表演上发生的事吗？

translation.en: That's right. It is about what happened to Sarah.
translation.zh: 是的 是关于莎拉

translation.en: Okay. Listen, I'll talk to you, but you're gonna have to order something
translation.zh: 好吧 听着 我可以跟你们谈 但你得点些东西

translation.en: because otherwise my boss is gonna get mad.
translation.zh: 否则我的老板会生气的

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, well, I could eat something.
translation.zh: 好吧 我可以吃点东西

translation.en: Sure, yeah. I'll have…
translation.zh: 当然 好的 我要来一份…

translation.en: Oh, you know what, they got the sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.zh: 你看 他们有邋遢辣椒堡

translation.en: They're back. Yeah, we'll take two of those. The sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.zh: 它们又回来了 好 我们要两份邋遢辣椒堡

translation.en: Do you want to add two sloparitas for five bucks more?
translation.zh: 要不要加五块钱 换两杯邋遢玛格丽塔？

translation.en: -[Conan] Let's do it. -Two, dos, sloparitas.
translation.zh: -可以 -可以 两杯邋遢玛格丽塔

translation.en: -Yes. -I'll be back with your food.
translation.zh: -好的 -马上给您上菜

translation.en: You're gonna love this sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.zh: 你一定会喜欢这个邋遢辣椒堡的

translation.en: You have never had a wetter sandwich. It's unbelievable.
translation.zh: 你肯定从来没吃过 这么湿啪啪的三明治 好吃上天

translation.en: All right. Well, I'm looking forward to it.
translation.zh: 好吧 我很期待

translation.en: It's like eating throw up. That's delicious.
translation.zh: 就像在吃呕吐物一样 可香了

translation.en: All right, we got two sloppy jalapeñ-joes.
translation.zh: 来了 两份邋遢辣椒堡

translation.en: Yes, we sure do.
translation.zh: 是的 就是这个

translation.en: And two sloparitas.
translation.zh: 还有两杯邋遢玛格丽塔

translation.en: Two sloparitas.
translation.zh: 两杯邋遢玛格丽塔

translation.en: This is good. And you gotta try some of this signature spicy slop sauce.
translation.zh: 真不错 你得尝尝他家的招牌邋遢辣酱

translation.en: [Terry] You know, it just makes it extra sloppy.
translation.zh: 你知道吧 让它邋遢上加邋遢

translation.en: [Deb] That is extremely hot…
translation.zh: 真的很辣

translation.en: Yeah. That's good. You have never had a sloppier sandwich.
translation.zh: 嗯 没事 你肯定从没吃过这么邋遢的三明治

translation.en: -Get right into it, huh? -[Terry] Yup. Eat up.
translation.zh: -那我们开吃吧？ -嗯 动手

translation.en: Yeah, I got other tables, so…
translation.zh: 我还得去服务别的桌 所以…

translation.en: Well, I don't have other murders. So.
translation.zh: 我可没有别的 谋杀案需要解决 所以…

translation.en: -God, it's wet. -Okay.
translation.zh: -天啊 真够湿的 -好吧

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 嗯 好的

translation.en: [Terry] That is a sloppy sandwich.
translation.zh: 这三明治可真邋遢

translation.en: -[Deb] I tried to warn you. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我本想提醒你的 -是啊

translation.en: [Terry] All right, you got some questions in your notebook.
translation.zh: 好了 你在笔记本上记了一些问题

translation.en: [Deb] Yeah, did you have questions for me?
translation.zh: 是啊 你有什么问题要问我吗？

translation.en: Go ahead. Shoot. This is your time to shine.
translation.zh: 来吧 问吧 展示一下

translation.en: -Jesus Christ. -[Terry] Hey, we haven't got all day.
translation.zh: -天啊 -嘿 我们待会还有事呢

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 好吧 抱歉

translation.en: Wanna take another bite first? Are you hungry?
translation.zh: 想先吃一口吗？你饿了吗？

translation.en: Let me get that sloppy for you. You've never had a sloppy sandwich.
translation.zh: 让我帮你把它弄得更邋遢点 你之前不是没吃过邋遢三明治吗？

translation.en: -Well, this is great. -Just slop it. Really slop it.
translation.zh: -好 挺好 -邋遢 好好邋遢一下子

translation.en: No, it's great. It's very aggressive on your part.
translation.zh: 确实 真不错 你这边味挺冲啊

translation.en: [Terry] Go ahead.
translation.zh: 再来两口

translation.en: [Terry] Dive in there, Conan.
translation.zh: 好好吃 柯南

translation.en: Is it true Captivating Keith
translation.zh: 这是真的吗？万人迷基思

translation.en: replaced you with Sarah 'cause he thought you'd gotten too old?
translation.zh: 用莎拉把你换掉了 因为他觉得你太老了？

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Conan. What the hell's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 柯南 你是有什么毛病吗？

translation.en: I spent the best years of my life
translation.zh: 我最好的年华

translation.en: getting shoved into boxes and like, attacked
translation.zh: 都是被塞在箱子里度过的 还会被鸽子

translation.en: by doves or very mean animals.
translation.zh: 或者别的什么倒霉动物攻击

translation.en: For what? So I can be replaced
translation.zh: 为了什么？就为了被

translation.en: by some 19-year-old with fake boobs
translation.zh: 某个挺着假胸的19岁臭女人取代？

translation.en: who doesn't even know how to pick a closed-shackle padlock.
translation.zh: 她连脚链上的锁都不会撬

translation.en: [Deb] It's humiliating!
translation.zh: 真侮辱人！

translation.en: Get in there! You're not--
translation.zh: 快吃！你根本没在…

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about! I'm eating everything!
translation.zh: 你在这说什么呢？ 没看我正在大口吃吗？

translation.en: [Deb] He's right. You're not slopping the Joe.
translation.zh: 他说得对 你这吃法根本不够邋遢

translation.en: I wanna die.
translation.zh: 我要死了

translation.en: Another question for you.
translation.zh: 还有一个问题要问你

translation.en: Is it safe to say you held a grudge against Sarah?
translation.zh: 可以说你对莎拉怀恨在心吗？

translation.en: Duh! Wouldn't you?
translation.zh: 废话！要是你你不气吗？

translation.en: Probably. What's wrong with your face?
translation.zh: -可能吧 -你的脸怎么了

translation.en: I have high blood pressure.
translation.zh: 我高血压

translation.en: Is there anyone else who might have wanted to hurt her?
translation.zh: 还有其他人可能想伤害她吗？

translation.en: She used to be another magician's assistant. Magic Melvin.
translation.zh: 莎拉以前是另一位魔术师 魔力梅尔文的助手

translation.en: Magic Melvin?
translation.zh: 魔力梅尔文？

translation.en: Yeah. I heard they separated on bad terms, so you could talk to him.
translation.zh: 是的 我听说他们分开闹得挺不愉快 所以你们可以跟他谈谈

translation.en: [Terry] You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Maybe you need to get in that sloppy--
translation.zh: 你应该继续吃你的邋遢…

translation.en: No, I can't. I honestly, I have had so much of that right now.
translation.zh: 不 我不行了 真的 我吃太多了

translation.en: -Everything's gonna be okay. -[Deb] It's not gonna be okay!
translation.zh: -一切都会好起来的 -根本不会！

translation.en: Dude, look at my life!
translation.zh: 朋友 看看我的人生！

translation.en: No one wants to hire a 40-year-old magician's assistant!
translation.zh: 没人想雇一个40岁的魔术师助理！

translation.en: Oh, please. I work in this crappy job.
translation.zh: -得了吧 -我在做这份破工作

translation.en: My clothes smell like steam meat. My stupid boyfriend tried to cheer me up
translation.zh: 我的衣服闻起来像腊肉 我的笨蛋男朋友试图哄我开心

translation.en: by buying me a puppy, but I have allergies.
translation.zh: 就送了我一只小狗 但是我却过敏

translation.en: So, I had to tell him, "You can't keep that dog in my house."
translation.zh: 所以我只能告诉他 不能把那只狗养在我家里

translation.en: And then he said, "I can't talk right now, Deb. I'm with my wife and kids."
translation.zh: 然后他说：“我现在不方便说话 黛比 我跟老婆、孩子在一起呢

translation.en: "And you know we have boundaries."
translation.zh: 你知道我们之间有界限的”

translation.en: So, now I have no choice but to go over to his house
translation.zh: 所以现在没有办法 我只能去他家

translation.en: and make a scene in front of his entire family.
translation.zh: 在他全家面前大闹一场

translation.en: I'll take this when you're ready.
translation.zh: 你准备结账的时候叫我

translation.en: [Terry] Thanks to Deb's tip,
translation.zh: 多亏黛比的提示

translation.en: we brought Captivating Keith's rival, Magic Melvin, in for questioning.
translation.zh: 我们把万人迷基思的死对头 魔力梅尔文叫来审问

translation.en: It was time for Conan and me to take the gloves off.
translation.zh: 是时候让柯南跟我 把案件的进展推向高潮了

translation.en: We got a suspect. We got this guy Melvin coming in.
translation.zh: 我们有嫌疑人了 有一个叫梅尔文的家伙会过来

translation.en: -We're gonna break this guy. -Okay.
translation.zh: -让我们碾碎那个家伙 -好的

translation.en: We're gonna break his will.
translation.zh: 我们会碾碎他的意志

translation.en: Want to do good cop bad cop? Or should we just both be bad cop?
translation.zh: 要不要试试好警察和坏警察那招？ 或者我们俩都扮坏？

translation.en: I think two bad-- I think bad cop, bad cop.
translation.zh: 我觉得两个坏警察 我觉得你也坏 我也坏

translation.en: -[Conan] Bad cop, worse cop. -[Terry] Yeah.
translation.zh: -一个是坏警察 一个是更坏的警察 -是的

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Can I get you anything? Coffee, anything you need?
translation.zh: 需要给你来什么吗？ 咖啡？或者别的？

translation.en: Actually, yup, you know what, I'll have a breakfast burrito.
translation.zh: 好的 你知道吗？我想要个早餐卷饼

translation.en: Uh, three eggs,
translation.zh: 加三个蛋

translation.en: soft scrambled, onions and peppers,
translation.zh: 蛋要半熟滑蛋 加上洋葱跟辣椒

translation.en: Tabasco, salt, and pepper.
translation.zh: 辣椒仔、盐和胡椒 （嫌疑人二号 死对头魔力梅尔文）

translation.en: And you know what my favorite trick is?
translation.zh: 知道我最爱的戏法是什么吗？

translation.en: Making that little thing disappear every morning.
translation.zh: 每天早上把那个小饼变没

translation.en: Okay, no food for a murder suspect.
translation.zh: 行了 谋杀案嫌疑人可没有吃的

translation.en: Do you guys want anything?
translation.zh: 你俩需要什么吗？

translation.en: Get out of here, Hughes. You're the worst.
translation.zh: 滚出去 休斯 最烦的就是你

translation.en: Now, you listen to me, Melvin. Grab a seat, O'Brien.
translation.zh: 现在 梅尔文 听我说 坐下 奥布莱恩

translation.en: God, that started off so cool.
translation.zh: 天啊 这个开场动作可真酷

translation.en: I know, I couldn't--
translation.zh: 我知道 我不能…

translation.en: You flipped it and then you couldn't land it.
translation.zh: 你把它翻过来 但是却放不下去

translation.en: No, I just-- I didn't think about it ahead of time.
translation.zh: 不 我只是做之前没想清楚

translation.en: [Terry] So, magic Melvin.
translation.zh: 所以 魔力梅尔文

translation.en: Can you see me through the mirror?
translation.zh: 你能透过镜子看到我吗？

translation.en: Oh, hi. I talk to my wife like this when she's doing her makeup.
translation.zh: 嘿 我妻子对镜化妆的时候 我也是这样跟她说话的

translation.en: -You got a lot of jokes, Melvin. -Yeah, you got a lot of jokes.
translation.zh: -你笑话挺多啊 梅尔文 -是呢 笑话挺多啊

translation.en: Well, you know, as a magician I do have patter and I do like to have fun.
translation.zh: 你知道 作为魔术师口条得顺 而且我本人也确实挺搞笑的

translation.en: Tell my partner a joke.
translation.zh: 给我搭档讲个笑话

translation.en: Alright, so these two Jews walk into a--
translation.zh: 好 有两个有犹太人走进了一间…

translation.en: -Jews, okay, no. We're not cool with that. -Okay, alright, we're not gonna do that.
translation.zh: -犹太人 不 我们很介意 -好 我们不讲这个

translation.en: [Terry] Do something else.
translation.zh: 讲个别的

translation.en: Alright. So, four or five Jews--
translation.zh: 好 四五个犹太人…

translation.en: -No, no, no. -You know what? No.
translation.zh: -不 -你知道吗？不行

translation.en: [Terry] No, listen up, Melvin.
translation.zh: 不 听清楚 梅尔文

translation.en: Do you know what happened to your former assistant, Sarah, today?
translation.zh: 你知道今天 你以前的助理莎拉 发生了什么事吗？

translation.en: Yes, it's terrible. It's a magician's worst nightmare.
translation.zh: 是的 很糟糕 这是魔术师最可怕的噩梦

translation.en: Unbelievable acting.
translation.zh: 难以置信的表演

translation.en: You don't seem that busted up about it and I wonder why?
translation.zh: 你看起来并没有很难过 我想知道为什么

translation.en: 'Cause maybe you had something to do with it!
translation.zh: 可能是因为你跟这事有关系！

translation.en: Detective, what are you accusing me of?
translation.zh: 警探 你是要指控我什么？

translation.en: A young woman was murdered against her will today
translation.zh: 今天有一个 年轻的女人不情愿地被杀了

translation.en: and if I find out that you had anything to do with it,
translation.zh: 如果我发现你跟这事有关系的话

translation.en: I swear to God, I will peel off your skin,
translation.zh: 我对老天爷发誓 我要把你的皮扒了

translation.en: eat it and then shit it out
translation.zh: 全都吃了再拉出来

translation.en: and use that excrement
translation.zh: 然后用那堆排泄物

translation.en: as fertilizer to grow a tree from which I will one day hang you from.
translation.zh: 做肥料种棵树 有一天我会把你吊死在那棵树上

translation.en: You're gonna die and we're going to watch you,
translation.zh: 你死定了 我们会看着你

translation.en: unless you tell us exactly, exactly what happened!
translation.zh: 除非你老实告诉我们发生了什么！

translation.en: -What happened? -What happened?
translation.zh: -发生了什么？ -发生了什么？

translation.en: Detectives, I am as law-abiding as they come.
translation.zh: 警探们 我可是遵纪守法的好公民

translation.en: I can give you an example.
translation.zh: 我可以给你举个例子

translation.en: Whenever I find something that's not mine, I always return it.
translation.zh: 每次我捡到东西 都会给人家还回去

translation.en: Such as this quarter I just found
translation.zh: 就像这个25美分的硬币

translation.en: -What the--? -behind your ear!
translation.zh: -什么… -在你耳朵后面发现的

translation.en: And wait! Oh, oh, my goodness. Look at this, another one!
translation.zh: 等一下 我的天 看看 还有一个！

translation.en: Can you see that?
translation.zh: 你看到了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, he's got it in his hand before…
translation.zh: 那个硬币本来就在他…

translation.en: That's incredible!
translation.zh: 真是不可思议！

translation.en: Quarters are very easy to lose behind your ears
translation.zh: 25五美分的硬币 经常会丢在耳朵后面

translation.en: -because they're small. -[Terry] 'cause they're small.
translation.zh: -因为它们很小 -因为它们很小

translation.en: But if I mix it up just a little bit. You can hear it and I--
translation.zh: 但是如果我摇一摇 你能听见 然后我…

translation.en: blow it, look at this.
translation.zh: 吹一下 看着啊

translation.en: And now it's a single half-dollar fifty-cent piece. [laughs]
translation.zh: 现在它们就变成了 一个50美分的硬币

translation.en: Make sure to put that in your piggy bank.
translation.zh: 别忘了把这个放到猪猪储蓄罐里

translation.en: -That is astounding. -It's not.
translation.zh: -真厉害 -并不

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 真是见鬼了

translation.en: He's always got one in the other hand.
translation.zh: 他那只手上还有一枚

translation.en: My jaw is on the floor.
translation.zh: 太惊人了

translation.en: Oh, well, then maybe we should clean it up.
translation.zh: 那么我们或许应该帮你擦擦

translation.en: -Actually, that was pretty cool. -Let me just clean up the jaw.

百分之百…
